title: Best Quotes of Week: BMW Championship
headline: Best Quotes Of Week: BMW Championship
description: Rory on why the Ryder Cup is more fun on the road, President Obama on why he loves golf, Johnny Miller on Sergio's missing link, Tom Watson on Tiger Woods, and Phil Mickelson on the tournament he loved so much he had to leave in Best Quotes of Week.
